name: Light Of Life (Renan Felipe)
description:
In a world, where darkness is taking the continents, young Elanor, the only elf able to restore the Light of life.
The young elf must face several obstacles, created by the goblins, responsible for the great darkness.

Commands ( This game supports Game pad )
Keyboard arrow - Move
C - Jump
X - Side Dash
Z - Dash Up
